name: Basketballverse
description: Basketballverse is the 1st cross-platform online basketball multiplayer in web3, powered by a single deflationary utility token $BVR and NFTs. Inspired by the 2 best games of their genre, Rocket League & NBA Street, and driven by basketball culture through athlete & global brand integrations, digital entertainment, and IRL fandom experiences. Led by experts in esports, gaming, basketball, and web3, with experience from Unity, NBA, EuroLeague, Nike, Fortnite, EA Sports, Epic Games, and Wasserman.
